item.title: About
item.description:
I write about two things:

  • Engineering work: systems, performance, architecture, the craft.
  • Adventures: mountaineering, trip reports, and what the mountains teach.

This site is a long-form notebook: reflective, practical, and occasionally cinematic.

If youâ€™re new here:

  • Start with Engineering for systems work, performance notes, and architecture decisions.
  • Start with Adventures for trip reports, route notes, and mountain lessons.

Contact

If you’d like to reach me, email is best. (Fill these in.)
